import "./App.css"; import React, { useState } from "react"; import {getAll,update,search} from "./BooksAPI" import Book from "./Components/Book" /** * * */ function App() { const [showSearchPage, setShowSearchpage] = useState(false); const [books,setBooks]=useState([]); React.useEffect(()=>{ const fetchBooks =async ()=>{ const BooksData= await getAll().then(x=>x); setBooks( BooksData); } fetchBooks()},[]); console.log(books); return (
{showSearchPage ? (
setShowSearchpage(!showSearchPage)} > Close
    ) : (

    MyReads

    Currently Reading

    x.shelf=="currentlyReading")} />

    Want to Read

    x.shelf=="wantToRead")} />

    Read

    1. The Hobbit
      J.R.R. Tolkien
    2. Oh, the Places You'll Go!
      Seuss
    3. The Adventures of Tom Sawyer
      Mark Twain
    setShowSearchpage(!showSearchPage)}>Add a book
    )}
    ); } export default App;
